name: Clue! (Courswork)
description:
This is the Clue game we have made for the Software Engineering Coursework

Instructions:

  • Web build
    • Click on the blue arrow at the bottom right to play the game in full screen
  • Windows
    • download the file
    • extract it
    • run the .exe
  • Mac
    • we can no Apple computers so could not test it properly 
    • we are aware that Apple may refuse to run the app because it is from "an untrusted source"
